title: Add properties support to Skottie
body:
Sometimes I need to change colors in lottie animation. For example: I have an lottie animated progress ring and I want to change it's color for dark and night theme. Similar feature is implemented in [AXrLottie](https://github.com/Aghajari/AXrLottie/#layerproperty).

It looks like skottie also has [properties support](https://skia.googlesource.com/skia/+/main/modules/skottie/include/SkottieProperty.h).
